_comment: This file defines all available tutorials for the tutorial API endpoints. The tutorial API (/api/tutorials) reads from this file to determine which MDX files to process as tutorials, ensuring only intentionally marked files are included. Each tutorial entry must have a corresponding MDX file at the specified path.

tutorials.title: Module 1: Introduction to Agents
tutorials.description: Understanding AI agents and the $47B opportunity

tutorials.title: Module 2: The Anatomy of an Agent
tutorials.description: Understanding how agents work - planning, reasoning, tools, and memory

tutorials.title: Module 3: Agent Memory
tutorials.description: How agents remember, learn, and build context over time

tutorials.title: Module 4: Agent-to-Agent Collaboration
tutorials.description: Building multi-agent systems that work together

tutorials.title: Module 5: Observability, Guardrails, & Evals
tutorials.description: Making agents reliable, safe, and production-ready
